failures.error: FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory
failures.note: File referenced in wildcard but does not exist

pytest.root_cause: truthlens_core.py executes argparse at module level, causing SystemExit during import
pytest.recommendation: Refactor modules to not execute argparse.parse_args() at import time. Use if __name__ == '__main__' guard.

ruff.recommendation: Install ruff for modern Python linting: pip install ruff

black.recommendation: Install black for code formatting: pip install black

guardian_v4.recommendation: Expand Guardian validation to full corpus. Current sample shows 75% failure rate.

critical_issues.issue: pytest test suite cannot run due to import-time side effects
critical_issues.fix: Add if __name__ == '__main__' guard around argparse code

critical_issues.issue: Guardian validation shows low pass rate (25%)
critical_issues.fix: Improve documentation, add hedging language, include epistemic boundaries

recommendations: Priority 1: Fix argparse usage in truthlens_core.py to enable pytest
Priority 2: Install ruff and black for comprehensive code quality checks
Priority 3: Run Guardian v4 corpus-wide validation (--corpus flag)
Priority 4: Improve documentation and hedging in failing modules
Priority 5: Consider adding pre-commit hooks for automated validation
